title: 10 ft ceilings, Pet friendly, 3 finish packages, Resident app
posting_body: ['We are currently offering virtual tours.', 'Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!', 'Union Place', '10 Independence Way, Franklin, MA, 02038', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', '(508) 466-6552 x 21', 'UNION PLACE: INVITING APARTMENTS IN FRANKLIN, MA', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1031 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Union Place is an inviting, pet-friendly apartment community in Franklin, MA, ideally located between Boston, MA and Providence, RI.', 'We offer 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom apartment homes for rent featuring multiple finish packages.', 'Select interior finishes include stainless steel appliances, wood plank flooring, and granite countertops.', 'Plus, all units include in-home washers and dryers and ample natural light.', 'Outside your home, enjoy our heated swimming pool, full-body fitness center, fully-enclosed dog park, and outdoor kitchen and grilling stations.', 'Our commuter-friendly location features proximity to the MBTA commuter rail, I-495, Route 1, and I-95.', 'Located on Independence Way, we are close to historic downtown Franklin, as well as nearby grocers, shops, and eateries.', 'We are currently offering self-guided tours.', 'Features', '- Three unique finish packages', '- Oak cabinets', '- 10 ft ceilings', '- Stainless steel
